interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: MRTREUP Chrome Nail Powder Palette , Metallic Mirror Effect Chrome Powder for Nails , Rose Gold Sliver Pink Holographic Nail Glitter Nail Pigment Powder for DIY Salon Nail Art Decorations Review Date: 2022/07/21 Store: MRTREUP Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.05 x 0.55 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Review Text: I like this as a touch of glitter option compared to glitter polishes that are using more chunky pieces of glitter. Tiny bit of product gives a great shimmer to manicure.
does not come with UV light, base or top coat Review Title: super fine glittery effect Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Kristin Ess The Oversized Satin Scrunchie ? Cheetah Kristin Ess ['But make it fashun! This chic satin, oversized scrunchie can be wrapped once or twice depending on the thickness of your hair. Try securing your ponytail with a regular elastic first and then put this over to maximize the look!'] {'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Kristin Ess', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 6.26 x 1.46 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'Item model number': '184-KES-0309', 'UPC': '840797141438'} this rust/burnt orange colored scrunchie is exactly what I wanted. It holds bun in place overnight
I have both thin and fine hair and wrap it 3 times around a messy top knot bun
I feel it would look great and effortless wrapped once or twice for someone with thicker or fuller hair
it is accurately described oversized love it! super soft large scrunchie great hold Marine Forest Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit, 2 Colors in 1 Waterproof and Long Lasting One Step Easy Color Brow Stamp with 24 Eyebrow Stencils Shaping Kit Reusable, 1 Brush and 1 Razor Marine Forest {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Product Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.71 x 0.71 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} I am pleasantly surprised the simplicity this product provides for brown definition. I have never used a similar product. Simple-just choose the right stencil for your born shape and tap the foam applicator on brows. Also comes with small brush used for finishing touches and small razor. I have not used the razor.
The natural brown shade was right for me with medium brown hair and brows.
Did not easily smear easy to use brow kit. did not easily smear Eyebrow Stamp and Eyebrow Stencil Kit, One Step Eyebrow Stamp and Shaping Kit for Perfect Brow, Eyebrow Brush,Eyebrow soap kit ,Gel Brow Soap Wax, Eyeshadow Stick Shimmer Eyeshadow Pencil ,Eye Makeup Arindar {'Brand': 'Arindar', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmer,Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Specialty': 'Sweatproof', 'Package Dimensions': '6.89 x 6.77 x 1.5 inches; 4.97 Ounces'} This brow color was a bit too dark for me and I have yet to find a stencil that I can get used to.
This item came with lots of stencil options and I brow bar too
I really like both eyeshadow sticks and soft blenders lots of items for the price MRTREUP Hair Brush Spray Set With Detangling Wide Tooth Comb And Detanger Brush For Curly Hair With Hair Mist Spray Bottle 10oz Curl Hair Tools For Women Men Black Natural Hair 3a To 4c Hair Types MRTREUP {'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 2 x 5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} I would buy this set just for the spray bottle.
I has an extended spray with a very fine mist! I would love to use this in the summer heat to spray cool water on face/body
the brush and comb are wide toothed and sturdy Love this spray bottle MISTING style Travel Bottles for Toiletries - Autdor 3OZ Travel Size Toiletries Set TSA Approved Travel Containers BPA Free LeakProof Refillable Liquid Travel Accessories for Shampoo Conditioner and Lotion Autdor {'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.24 x 1.65 inches; 5.93 Ounces', 'UPC': '774848982001', 'Manufacturer': 'Autdor'} I can’t say enough good things about these. They feel great and were perfect for our camper. My wife loves that they come with labels. Seriously a great set. So great Big Hair Claw Clips for Women and Girls - 4.3 Inch 8 Pcs Matte Claw Hair Clips for Thick Hair, Large Jaw Clips for Thin Hair, 2 Styles Strong Hold Hair Accessories for Girls HH Fashion {'Brand': 'HH Fashion', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal'} Strong hold. Open wide and finishing is good on these. Good quality and value. Glitter Eyeliner Liquid, Liquid Eyeliner Colorful Set, 10 Colors Liquid Glitter Eyeliner, Glitter Liquid Eyeshadow Set, Shimmer Sparkling Neon Eye liners for Women, Glitter Eyeliner Pencil Reddhoon {'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 3.86 x 0.67 inches; 4.66 Ounces'} Great selection of colors. Shadow is color tinted each with fine matching glitter mixed well throughout great colors with same color glitter mixed in YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party) YouClean ['Brand:', 'YouClean', 'Item Form:', 'Sheet', 'Formulation:', 'Concentrated plant-based soap', 'Scent:', 'Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)', 'Package Box Size:', '2 x 1 x 1.5 inch', 'www.shopyouclean.com', "We are changing our packaging. No more small plastic cases! Our new packaging is 100% biodegradable paper. All 300 sheets are tightly packed in 3 tiny paper boxes (100 sheets/box) which nicely fit in any purse/wallet, handbag, and kids' pack-backs. Check out our 9 scent collections: - Tea Party - Citrus Collection - Purple Heart - Pink Pamper - Red Passion - Blanca Elegance - Seaside Vacation - The Adventure - The Nonsense (unscented)"] {'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'YouClean', 'Scent': 'Tea Party', 'Material Type Free': 'Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil) See more', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '609670421100', 'Manufacturer': 'YouClean'} These tiny soaps are perfect for travel and I love them for camping.
Easy dissolve. Great packaging perfect travel size Combofix 2Pcs Silk Scrunchies Mulberry Silk Hair Ties Cute Large Scrunchie Elastic Bands Thick Curly Hair Black Brown Ponytail Fixing Hair Tie Suitable for Girls of all ages combofix {'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Combofix', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 5.94 x 0.55 inches; 0.67 Ounces', 'UPC': '774848980564'} feel like satin not silk
nice pure black and chocolate brown in color
can barely get around my thin ponytail twice. would not recommend for thick hair or full ponytail small scrunchies MRTREUP Chrome Nail Powder Palette , Metallic Mirror Effect Chrome Powder for Nails , Rose Gold Sliver Pink Holographic Nail Glitter Nail Pigment Powder for DIY Salon Nail Art Decorations MRTREUP {'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.05 x 0.55 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} I like this as a touch of glitter option compared to glitter polishes that are using more chunky pieces of glitter. Tiny bit of product gives a great shimmer to manicure.
does not come with UV light, base or top coat super fine glittery effect
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor hair accessories and beauty tools, particularly stylish, functional items like silk scrunchies. Their recent purchase of nail products indicates an expanding interest in beauty items that enhance their aesthetic and personal grooming routines.

- **Color Trends:** They maintain a strong inclination towards warm tones and earthy palettes while appreciating classic colors such as black and brown. This reflects a balanced approach to their beauty choices and interests.

- **Functionality:** The user prioritizes practicality in their beauty selections, seeking versatile accessories for unique hair needs and now extending this practicality to nail art with products that provide efficient results.

- **Aesthetic Appeal:** They have a growing appreciation for visually charming products that enrich their styling and grooming routines, as shown by their choice of fine glitter for manicures, highlighting a preference for subtle elegance.

- **Experience with Variability:** The user shows adaptability in their beauty product selections, focusing on quality and performance, ensuring that new additions align with their established standards.

- **Feedback Trends:** Their reviews reflect a discernment in product evaluation, balancing aesthetic appeal and functionality while emphasizing performance.

Overall, the user is curating a refined collection of quality beauty products that not only enhance their lifestyle but also expand their interests from hair care to nail artistry, reinforcing their commitment to effective and stylish solutions.
